channel.title: Comments for page "Fierce as the Flame"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Fierce as the Flame"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: It's likely that the pins in TWEWY references Shingen's FÃ»rinkazan, and McMasters references the pins. He has explicitly stated that TWEWY is TEH B3ST G4ME EVAR!!!!1eleven several times, after all.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: actually if you combine everything together. the runic PW items are a pin set from The World Ends With You. add in the fact that you get a player pin at a certain point and when you beat face to face 2 you see a preview from the Reaper's Game. everything is leading to The World Ends With You.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
This isn't a reference to "The World Ends With You", it's a reference to the 16th century samurai warlord Takeda Shingen.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/F%C5%ABrinkazan
